title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller lauer for application logic

title: Authentication vs Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication meanas confirming your own identity, wheras authorization menas being allowed access to the system

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: ORMs are much easier than straight SQL, but sometimes SQL queries are still the best way to go for more specific data needs.
